result.execSummary:
The defendant William C Konichek was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order - Injunction, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.12(8)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Probation / JSS to meet with the def while he is in custody
.
Concurrent with: Both counts 1 & 2 are concurrent with each other, with conditions also concurrent
.

miscConds.notes:
Def to undergo Alcohol and Drug Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations. 
.

Complete a Mental Health assessment and follow-through with any treatment recommendations
.

Court costs/fees are REMITTED by the Court

Pay DOC Supervision fees - to be paid directly to the Dept of Corrections

Credit for 24 days if probation is ever revoked

timeConds.notes:
The defendant is to remain in jail from today to 10-10-2022.  The defendant is to be released on 10-10-2022 @ 9:00 a.m.
.
